name: df-seqom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cseqom(c0, c1), cima(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), com))
comment: Index-aware recursive definitions over ` _om ` . A mashup of ~ df-rdg and ~ df-seq , this allows for recursive definitions that use an index in the recursion in cases where Infinity is not admitted. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Nov-2014.)
